text:
@perlmutations @herbiechar And Type 1 diabetics like my partner have a 30% greater chance of dying if they get coronavirus, and some people are now getting diabetes once they get the virus.  Protect everyone and please wear a mask and social distance! 

https://t.co/QeSf05H7oJ
